channel.title: Comments on: Reducing Backbone Routers To Nothing More Than Configuration

item.title: By: Zach Curtis
item.dc:creator: Zach Curtis
item.description: Overriding the router ctor was the ticket for me! I messed around with overriding initialize WAY too long. Thanks so much.
item.content:encoded: Overriding the router ctor was the ticket for me! I messed around with overriding initialize WAY too long. Thanks so much.

item.title: By: Colin Jack
item.dc:creator: Colin Jack
item.description: Looks like something I would definitely like to try, keep up the good work with these excellent BB posts.
item.content:encoded:
Looks like something I would definitely like to try, keep up the good work with
these excellent BB posts.

item.title: By: Dan (Danny) Fellars
item.dc:creator: Dan (Danny) Fellars
item.description: Hey Derick, I was going through your BBMailApp code and saw this boiler plate code and wondered why it wasn't part of Marionette itself. Good to hear that is your plan. That would be very useful.
item.content:encoded: Hey Derick, I was going through your BBMailApp code and saw this boiler plate code and wondered why it wasn’t part of Marionette itself.  Good to hear that is your plan.  That would be very useful.
